oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hikayat Raja Kulawandu : manuscript, 1838
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Munsyi, Muhammad Ali bin Abdul Latif (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 10 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 150r), copy completed on 5 Zulhijjah 1253 AH [March 2, 1838 AD] in the hand of Muhammad Ali bin Abdul Latif Munsyi.
MS Indo 27. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Malay in the Jawi-Arabic script.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic stories, Indonesian
Indonesian literature
